text: For anyone interested in future, Gmail cleans up the link, so best way to work through this is to host an html page that the user can click to generate SMS link, or directly send the link and have them respond from there

<@U04B32JHTUZ> or anyone from the HubSpot team,
I've been trying to respond to messages from custom channels using the HubSpot mobile app. While it works on the web, the channel doesn't appear in the mobile app, preventing me from responding.
I remember this working before. Could you let me know what needs to be done to enable responses from a custom channel in the HubSpot app?

Is there a way that a HubSpot user can reply to a custom channel through email? We're trying to implement a customer messaging system in a SPA that uses HubSpot. The employees typically use email to respond and we would like to keep it that way. But we would like the customers to be able to contact them in the SPA.
